mapper.update: update category set pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `desc` = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bg_url = #{bgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, logo = #{logo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, post_time = #{postTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select category_id, pid, `name`, `desc`, bg_url, logo, user_id, post_time, `status` from category
